"The whole time I was shooting, I was just thinking about seeing the student section," said Allen Iverson , who went 26-0 in Hartford while playing for UConn. This is a building in my mind that was always blue and white. It was the first time the Celtics played in Hartford since a preseason game in 1995. Prior to then, the Celtics played three regular season games a year in the arena formerly known as the Civic Center.
